page.shortlink: ux formview builder editor settings Editor configuration genie
page.description: This genie lets you configure an editor in the UX component without actually having to close the Form View Builder.

section.description: Editor containers in a UX control have a 'Configuration settings' property that is defined in the 'Editor Properties' section of the control's properties list. You can use the 'Configuration settings' property to specify a JSON string that defined a genie. This genie can then be called from within the Form builder using the 'Editor configuration genie' setting. The genie can then be used to configure the editor for the corresponding field in the Form View Builder.
